about_the_game:
THE ORIGINAL GAME
In the original version of this game, a young mechanic girl ( and nymphomaniac former hooker ) inherits from her sexual client a huge vehicle repair shed. However, this workshop is in the middle of a neighborhood dominated by a gang of criminal freaks. Anaïs is a specialist in vehicle mechanics Cars, motorcycles, airplanes, and tanks. Anything that has metal wheels or wings. She was raised by her mother. However, she discovers that she has a sexual client who, after dying, leaves a huge machine workshop for her. The workshop is in addition to being complete. In addition, the sexual client also left several vehicles that are worth a fortune.
However, she will have to face a dangerous gang of traffickers who dominate that region.
What will be your main weapon? SEX, seduction, strategy, and violence. Anaïs doesn't hide that she is addicted to sex. Her passion for sex is only comparable to her obsession with the smell of fuel and grease. Her late sexual client hid something very important there. The dangerous gang I mentioned knows this and will do anything to find what appears to be a precious treasure ... something much more coveted. What is hidden in the workshop?
Anais was a very famous whore, precisely because she had good sex as few whores did. She went from being a talented sex worker to traveling the world. However, her last client was a very mysterious rich man. An obsessive vehicle collector and passionate about mechanics. Before he died, he decided to donate his motorized patrimony to the young bitch, mainly after discovering that she learned to repair cars, motorcycles, and boats with her brother.



Now, Anais is a formidable boss of a criminal organization that trades and produces an exotic hallucinogenic mushroom. Such a mushroom sexually stimulates its users, making them avid and active pornographic performers. Inside the Clockwork Pussy follows the same path as the others being developed for other games: It has a more narrative focus and the characters' stories. So now this DLC adds a visual novel narrative to third-person gameplay. This DLC has been completely rewritten to integrate a coherent narrative structure with the third-person style. All Orgipix Studios games are following this path to provide an incredible experience.
This DLC will also start a new phase for the character Anais, a.k.a. Clockwork Pussy.
This adventure will explore an unbelievable world of crime and trafficking around the exotic hallucinogenic mushroom, but with a lot of explicit sex and beatings.

This game (original and DLC) is in constant development. However, now this game has been remade from scratch to overcome the bugs that plagued players.

- Easy to use Third Person System user interface and Visual Novel Narrative.
- A rich storyline that progresses when each puzzle is solved
- Gorgeous graphics
- Easy-to-use controls
- Explicit Sex and Erotic situations



This is a Third-Person and Narrative visual game. Explore the scenery with the help of your mouse. The player runs a vehicle repair shop of all types. The aim is to explore the workshop newfound to find something very valuable that his deceased late sexual client hid on site. And she will have to do that before a dangerous local gang gets a hold of this supposed fortune.


The experience of the game goes far beyond exploring the workshop in search of a valuable object or seducing criminals with sex, libido, and body fluids. During this unusual search, Anais discovers things about her that could change her destiny completely. Likely, she inherited much more from her sexual client than she imagined.
Something, perhaps much more dangerous!
